properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 6:32AM EST until February 10 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...North Carolina...

Appomattox River Above Farmville affecting Amelia...Cumberland and
Prince Edward Counties

Meherrin River At Lawrenceville affecting Brunswick County

Cashie River Near Windsor affecting Bertie County


For the Appomattox Basin...including Farmville...Minor flooding is
forecast.For the Chowan Basin...including Lawrenceville...Minor
flooding is forecast.For the Lower Roanoke Basin...including
Windsor...Minor flooding is forecast.

The Flood Warning continues for...
The Cashie River Near Windsor
* from this morning to Monday evening...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 06:15 AM Friday the stage was 7.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 9.8 feet by
tomorrow early afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage
Monday afternoon.
* At 10.0 feet...Livermon Park and Zoo are inundated.  Portions of
King St, Granville St, Queen St, Rascoe St and Camden St are
flooded.
This river level is comparable to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on Feb
6 2016.
